item.title: Thank you for your application
item.description: The course of this series is somewhat easy. In the first article, I share my preparation strategy and some things that I learned along the way, which contributed to the offers I received â€” followed by a deep dive into my interviewing experiences and the resources I used. Finally, ending the series with the conclusion and some more tips.
